title: Zoom AI Companion boosts user engagement and satisfaction with Claude \ Anthropic

metadata.title: Zoom AI Companion boosts user engagement and satisfaction with Claude \ Anthropic
metadata.description: Discover how Zoom's AI Companion, powered by Anthropic's Claude, transforms hybrid work productivity with automated meeting summaries, real-time assistance, and collaborative document creation. Learn how this AI-first approach helps teams work smarter and faster.
